name: Podcast Cover Templates / Free Sample
description:
Fully Editable Podcast Cover Designs.


üéôÔ∏è After recording our podcasts, we sometimes struggle for a long time between unfamiliar programs and meaningless designs.


üéôÔ∏è After recording podcasts, we sometimes struggle between designing graphics and choosing our own layout and design of the podcast. We also have a hard time figuring out what software to use and how best to apply designs to the content.


A Podcaster should be only concerned with is the quality of the content, not the Cover design of the Podcast. That's why I prepared a Podcast Cover Template that everyone can use easily. You can start using it by choosing a design that will best suit your podcast, uploading the image you want and adjusting each color if desired.
